content: intermediate crochet project materials ▪ milk cotton yarn light worsted weight 4 contrasting colors 50g each + additional 20g for pompom optional ▪ 4 5 mm us 7 crochet hook ▪ tapestry needle ▪ pompom maker optional finished measurements ▪ approx 8 5 in long x 10 in wide flat fits 20-22 in circumference adult head pattern abbreviations chain-chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet chain-space- chain space decrease- single_crochet 2 stitches together decrease gauge ▪ 6 5 sts + 4 row = 2 in double_crochet pattern notes ▪ you will need 4 contrasting colors the 4th color will be the main color and will be used for the crown top of hat brim and for joining the granny squares together ▪ each completed granny square should measure approx 4 in x 4 in instructions make 10 granny squares 3 rounds each + 1 border as follows round 1 start with a magic loop ch3 counts as first double_crochet work 2 double_crochet into the ring *chain 1 work 3 double_crochet into the ring repeat from * two more times chain 1 join with a slip_stitch to the top of the beginning chain 3 to close the round fasten_off tighten center change colors round 2 join yarn into ch1-space chain 3 work 2 double_crochet into the same space chain 1 work 3 double_crochet into the same space corner *in the next chain space place 3 double_crochet ch1 3dc repeat from * 2 more times join with a slip_stitch to the top of the beginning chain 3 fasten_off change colors round 3 join into the corner space chain 3 work 2 double_crochet into the same corner space ch1 3 double_crochet into the same space *place 3 double_crochet in the next space then 3 double_crochet ch1 3 double_crochet into the corner space repeat from * 2 more times place 3dc in the next space join with a slip_stitch to the top of the beginning chain 3 to close the round fasten_off change to main color round 4 border join to corner chain 1 * 2hdc ch1 2hdc in corner place 1hdc in each stitch across 9sts repeat * around join to 1st stitch fasten_off weave in all ends construction place granny squares in two row of five squares each join flat slip stitching one side of each granny squares together then each row together on wrong side of the work then join again in the round weave in all loose ends crown decrease round 1 join yarn to top of round chain 1 * 1 single_crochet in each stitch of granny square decrease in each corner repeat * all the way around join round round 2 ch1 * 1sc decrease repeat * around join to 1st stitch round 3 ch1 decrease around join round 4 repeat round 3 fasten_off and leave a tail approximately 16 inches long to weave top closed secure brim repeat round 1 of crown decrease round 2 ch1 i single_crochet in each stich around join to 1st single_crochet repeat
